text: O vos messenger non saddened those hasten disbelieve among those dictus Nos believe their mouths dum their hearts non believe Among Jews some listened to lies They listened to people nunquam met vos qui distorted words context tunc dictus vos dedit hoc accept it vos dedit anything different beware Whomever DEUS testimentum divert vos perfecit nihil help eum DEUS! DEUS NON wish PURGATUS their hearts They incurred humiliation in hoc saeculum in Hereafter they suffer terrible retribution
